  Keith,
  Int=
eresting sword! I am not with my library at the moment, but this
  certainl=
y should meet anybody's definition of shin-gunto suitable for a
  WWII disp=
lay. Smith was a person named Katsumura Masakatsu. He appears to
  have had=
/claimed a traditional title (hitatchi no suke??)and an honorary
  affiliat=
ion (minamoto). The nengo is way cool. Looks like he made it in
  1935 to c=
ommemorate the 2600 anniversary of the founding of the imperial
  line - wh=
ich did not occur until 1940. VERY patriotic. Way cool.
  This sword might =
get more traction on the Token list.
  Thanks for the posting. This looks l=
ike a very nice sword.
  Peter
